about.name: Mahmoud Saadaoui
about.title: Full Stack Web Developer
about.bio: Full-stack developer focused on building fast, scalable, and reliable web applications. With strong skills in React, Next.js, Node.js, and DevOps (Docker, CI/CD), I deliver clean architectures and seamless user experiences from frontend to infrastructure.

capabilities.frontend: Frontend Development: React, Next.js, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, Bootstrap, Redux Toolkit, Zustand, TanStack Query
capabilities.backend: Backend Development: Node.js, Express.js, NestJS, RESTful APIs, WebSockets
capabilities.devops: DevOps: Docker, CI/CD pipelines, GitHub Actions, Nginx, VPS deployments
capabilities.systemDesign: System Design: Scalable architectures and performance optimization

bookmark.title: Bookmark
bookmark.description: Bookmark is a modern, fully responsive landing page built with HTML, JavaScript, and Tailwind CSS. Inspired by Frontend Mentor designs, this project focuses on layout, typography, and responsiveness to strengthen my Tailwind CSS and front-end design skills.

fylo.title: Fylo
fylo.description: Fylo is a sleek and responsive landing page built with HTML, JavaScript, and Tailwind CSS, featuring a dark/light mode toggle. This project helped me explore Tailwind customization and theme management while maintaining a clean, modern interface.

loopstudio.title: Loopstudio
loopstudio.description: Loopstudios is a responsive landing page built with HTML, JavaScript, and Tailwind CSS. Inspired by a Frontend Mentor challenge, this project strengthened my understanding of Tailwind layout design and responsive interface building.

BlogApp.title: Blog Pro â€“ Fullstack Blog Application
BlogApp.description: Blog Pro is a complete fullstack MERN (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) blog application built for educational and portfolio purposes.It allows users to create, edit, and manage blog posts with image uploads via Cloudinary, JWT-based authentication, and secure user management.The backend is powered by Node.js and Express, connected to MongoDB Atlas, while the frontend is built with React for a modern and responsive interface.

facebookClone.title: Facebook Clone
facebookClone.description: Modern React.js frontend project showcasing my skills in dynamic interfaces and clean design.

libreMap.title: LibreMap
libreMap.description: A dynamic mapping app built with React.js and Maplibre.js, displaying world capitals with interactive popups and customizable map styles.

booklyFront.title: Book Store
booklyFront.description: Book Store app built with React.js, using the Context API for state management and React Toastify for notifications. Users can add books to the cart, update quantities, and view the total price in real time.

bookly.title: Bookly | MERN App
bookly.description: Bookly is a full-featured Library Management System built with the MERN stack. Admins can manage books (add, edit, delete), while users can rate, comment, and add favorites. This project showcases my skills in full-stack development, JWT authentication, API integration, Cloudinary image handling, and state management with Redux Toolki

pshop.title: PShop
pshop.description: PShop is a full-featured eCommerce platform built with the MERN stack and Redux Toolkit. Users can browse products, manage carts, leave reviews, and complete purchases using PayPal or credit card payments. Admins can efficiently manage products, orders, and users through a modern dashboard. Product images are hosted on Cloudinary for fast and secure storage.

chat.title: Chat App
chat.description: Realtime Chat App is a modern, full-featured messaging platform built with TypeScript and the MERN stack. It includes secure authentication (JWT), email verification, real-time chat (Socket.IO), profile management via Cloudinary, and a smooth PWA experience installable on any device.
